page.title: 12Children's games;Fauldhouse
page.content: square metre. One person stands in front to kick a football at this area . The others stand behind him and when the ball bounces back off the wall one of them try to kick the ball and hit the area marked. If he misses he is out. {Skipping}is a game where you need a long bit of rope. Two people take the end of a rope and start to caw, that is to make the rope go up and down and round in a circle, there are three different types of jumps there is cawey,wavey when move the rope from side to side and peppers,when the rope is swung round very fast. There are many ryhmes children say when skipping eg,Sally in the kitchen doing a bit of stitching in comes the bogey man and out pops she. the next person to jump must do so before the rope has gone
